AuthorityCreated(address).details: MUST be triggered on a successful call to `newAuthority`.

calculateAuthorityAddress(address,bytes3.details: Beware that only the `newAuthority` function with the `_salt` parameter      is able to deterministically deploy an authority.

params._salt: The salt used to deterministically generate the authority address

newAuthority().details: On success, MUST emit an `AuthorityCreated` event.

newAuthority(address).details: On success, MUST emit an `AuthorityCreated` event.

newAuthority(address,bytes32).details: On success, MUST emit an `AuthorityCreated` event.

params._salt: The salt used to deterministically generate the authority address

newAuthority(bytes32).details: On success, MUST emit an `AuthorityCreated` event.

params._salt: The salt used to deterministically generate the authority address

calculateAuthorityAddress(address,bytes3.notice: Calculate the address of an authority to be deployed deterministically.

userdoc.notice: Allows anyone to reliably deploy a new Authority-History pair.
